long.de:
LinkedIn-E-Mail-Finder-Tool, mit dem Sie in Sekundenschnelle genaue gesch√§ftliche E-Mail-Adressen erhalten.

‚úÖ WIE FUNKTIONIERT ES?

Daten bereinigen: Bereinigen Sie automatisch Namen, Berufsbezeichnungen und Firmennamen. Entfernen Sie alle Sonderzeichen, Emojis, Gro√übuchstaben, LTD. LLC. und andere Firmenbezeichnungen.

long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US:
LinkedIn email finder tool that helps to get accurate business email addresses in seconds.

‚úÖ HOW DOES IT WORK?

Export lists and searches from LinkedIn Search result to CSV.

Find pro emails using scraping and email finder algorithms.

Clean Data: Automatically clean names, job titles and company names. remove all special characters, emojis, all caps, LTD. LLC. and other company denominations.

EXPORT GROUP MEMBERS
1. join the group, 2. click the group member link, 3. refresh the group member page to export members.

EXPORT EVENT ATTENDEES
1. attend the event, 2. click the attendees link,  3. refresh the search result page to export attendees.

EXPORT NEWSLETTER SUBSCRIBER
1. open your own newsletter, 2 refresh the newsletter page to export subscribers.

EXPORT POST/FEED COMMENTS
1. click post/feed menu "Copy to post link", 2. open the post link, 3, click the Export to CSV.

EXPORT POST/FEED REACTIONS(LIKE)
1. click post/feed menu "Copy to post link", 2. open the post link, 3, click reaction link to open reaction dialog, 4 click the Export to CSV.

üî• FEATURES

- Export LinkedIn Search result to CSV with professional emails.
- Export Group members
- Export Event attendees
- Export Newsletter subscribers
- Extract Post's comments & reactions
- Find anyone business email from LinkedIn profile and search result page.
- Verified B2B emails that you can trust.
- Save leads to contacts list.
- Manage your leads and create lists.

üëç TRY FOR FREE

Hit the ground running with NioLeads's free trial that provides you access to our Chrome Extension and 10 email credits to enjoy.

üîí PRIVACY

For more info: https://nioleads.com/privacy

Any question? Drop us a line at help@nioleads.com!
